name.ja: ヴォイドヴェルグ・ファランクス

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Galaxy Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains 200 ATK/DEF. If the equipped monster is DARK Attribute, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
